text:
So I've used it twice now...only for my hair ..I just put it all over my head and leave it in for about 2 hours..then wash it out really good because if you leave some in after you shower it still feels oily...I usually have to wash my hair twice
..but it feels sooooo soft after I use it. I notice that my ends haven't been breaking as bad..and im the type of person that styles my hair almost everyday :) definitely recommend.
